title: #315: The Halving With Dallas Rushing
description:
hank you so much for tuning in for another episode of Tin Foil Hat with Sam Tripoli. This episode I welcome Karma's Dallas Rushing to the show to explain the Bitcoin Halving! Thank you so much for your support.

Please Check out Dallas Rushing' internet:
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCMiOtNUmlOO0V01wXK8p0Kg

Twitter: https://twitter.com/dallasirushing

KARMA: https://karmaapp.io

Please check out all of our platforms:
Our Youtube page
Youtube.com/SamTripoli

Check out all the Tin Foil Hat Full Episode Videos at
brokensimulation.com

Youtube.com/SamTripoli

manscaped.com, and use code TINFOILHAT
